About me

My coding journey began in 2016, when I started teaching myself how to code using Free Code Camp and Codecademy. I decided that I needed to be more challenged in the workplace, and knew that a tech career might be the next move I had been looking for.
I am a proponent for clean design and clean code. I enjoy not only the building aspect of coding, but the creativity as well.
I am currently working through FreeCodeCamp's Front-End Development Certification course. Stay tuned for more projects coming soon.
